front.title: Guidelines for Authors and Reviewers of MIB Documents

abstract.t: This memo provides guidelines for authors and reviewers of IETF standards-track specifications containing MIB modules. Applicable portions may be used as a basis for reviews of other MIB documents. This document obsoletes RFC 4181, incorporating its update published in RFC 4841. Comments and discussion are invited on the opsawg@ietf.org mailing list.
